query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mixing_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  batchNumber VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  recipeId INT NOT NULL,
  recipeName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  volume INT NOT NULL,
  volumeM3 DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('planned', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'planned' NOT NULL,
  projectId INT,
  deliveryId INT,
  startTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
  endTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
  producedBy INT,
  approvedBy INT,
  notes LONGTEXT,
  qualityNotes LONGTEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3rf55phMSy1Bqm7.root --database XQpiGbEcueWdnyaoEtKtzk --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mixing_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  batchNumber VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  recipeId INT NOT NULL,
  recipeName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  volume INT NOT NULL,
  volumeM3 DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('planned', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'planned' NOT NULL,
  projectId INT,
  deliveryId INT,
  startTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
  endTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
  producedBy INT,
  approvedBy INT,
  notes LONGTEXT,
  qualityNotes LONGTEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
